100.title: Quantum Drive
100.description: A cutting-edge propulsion core capable of bending spacetime for deep-space travel. Reliable, powerful, and slightly terrifying to stand near.

101.title: Plasma Shield
101.description: An energy barrier that deflects cosmic radiation and hostile fire. Generates a faint hum when active—comforting, if you like staying alive.

102.title: Dice Good Luck Charm
102.description: Twin dice strung together, perfect for hanging in the cockpit. Science may not prove luck exists, but pilots swear by them.

103.title: Laser Cannon Turrets
103.description: Automated defense turrets equipped with rapid-fire laser arrays. Keeps raiders, pirates, and the occasional asteroid at bay.

104.title: Stellar Map Index Upgrade
104.description: Expanded navigational charts that unlock safer hyperspace lanes and hidden shortcuts between systems.

105.title: Holo Communication Array
105.description: Encrypted long-range holographic comms system. Crystal-clear transmissions across light-years, with only minimal chance of alien eavesdropping.

106.title: Escape Pod
106.description: Compact emergency capsule with thrusters, life support, and just enough rations to make it to the nearest starbase. Comfort not included.

107.title: Temporal Flux Stabilizer
107.description: Keeps your vessel anchored to its proper timeline, preventing… unwanted side effects of faster-than-light travel.

108.title: Mineral Drill
108.description: Heavy-duty extractor designed for asteroid and planetary mining. Efficient, loud, and devastating to anything made of rock.

109.title: Mineral Tether
109.description: Magnetic grappling system that reels in mined ore, cargo, or the occasional pirate wreckage. Stronger than it looks.
